#include <cstdio>
#include <iostream>
#include <map>
#include <vector>
 
using namespace std;
 
typedef long long ll;
typedef vector<int> vi;
 
map<int, vi> memo;
 
vi find(int x) {
    if (memo.count(x)) return memo[x];
    vi res(10);
    
    if (x > 0) {
        for (int l = 0; l < 10; l++) {
            vi prev = find(x/10 - (l > x%10));
            for (int i = 0; i < prev.size(); i++)
                res[(i + (l%2?l:l*2)) % 10] += prev[i];
        }
    } else {
        res[0] = x == 0;
    }
    
    return memo[x] = res;
}
 
ll f(int x) {
    vi v = find(x);
    ll res = 0;
    for (int i = 0; i < v.size(); i++) res += 1LL * i * v[i];
    return res;
}
 
int main() {
    int t;
    cin >> t;
    while (t--) {
        int a, b;
        cin >> a >> b;
        cout << f(b) - f(a-1) << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
